channel.title: The noobest of all, heelp!
channel.description:
SOMEONE PLEASE HELP ME!! Im new in this "MoperScape" thing. I installed it and everything works ok.
The only problem is that I dont see any monsters in wildy. I want a script that in the stores they sell like Dragon stuff. A script that monsters drop like 10k even if they are rats. I want to be a lvl 126 with full dragon + abyssal whip + glory ammy. Please I need help, I want this to be fun, to find king black dragons anywhere something like that. Please heeelp. I saw a screenshot of a guy who had 9999 air runes in his inventory, I want that! to edit the number of runes u got and ur stats, all that stuff! Please someone heeeelp

item.title: The noobest of all, heelp!
item.description:
@1337 wrote:

Lol why would you post this is the SCAR section (when you clearly dont know what scar is), when there’s 3 moparscape sections which are obviously better suited for your topic…

Read up on the stickied topic called ‘setting up your own moparscape server’ in ‘moparscape server tutorials’ set up your own server blah blah blah…

once you’ve done open up moparscape and press f1, then type in the name of your server (myserver123.no-ip.org or something like that)… press ok and continue to log into moparscape, your username should be admin and your password is whatever you want. Then once you are in you can type commands such as ‘::pickup 123 1000’, 123 being the item number and 1000 being how much of the item you want, you can also type other commands (depending on the server you’re running) such as ‘::barrows’ - for full barrows, ‘::cbrunes’ for loadsa runes’ etc…

You probably wont understand this, but keep lookin around the moparscape section on this forum, read up on all the tutorials (setting up your own server tutorials to begin with)…

Read full topic
